short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Health reminders while working on the desk

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension that will help you to stay healthier. It nudges you periodically to do essential small exercises when you are focused on your work and unconsciously forgetting to:
- drink some water
- stretch your arms
- fix your posture
- blink your eyes
- walk a bit

Changes log:

- 1.0
Initial version

- 1.0.1
Bug fix:
1. None of the options is getting displayed when clicking on the extension icon

- 1.0.2
Bug fix:
1. Every time Chrome starts there is a need to set the notifications
